comment._content: Chapultepec  means Cerro de Chapulines (Hill of grasshoppers)

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: This picture seems to be taken (copied) from one of William Henry Jackson collection(The Library of Congress, Digital Collections, Detroit Publishing Company), who phtotographed Mexico about 1891. At least is very alike to www.loc.gov/pictures/item/det1994005176/PP/ Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon dr.robertoduarte@hotmail.com
